title: Moab
subtitle: Mountain bike and raft the best of Utah
short_description: Mountain bike class trails like Klondike Bluff and the Sovereign Trail. Raft the legendary rapids of the Colorado River. Hike Moab's best trails, and rest your head on a riverside campsite. This 4-day adventure includes access to premier camping, expert guides, full course meals, drinks, van support, permits, and bike repair kit.
